General.Name: Jiangsu Shentong Valve Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Shentong Valve Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells special valves in China and internationally. The company primarily offers butterfly valves, ball valves, gate valves, globe valves, check valves, regulating valves, special valves, and non-standard valves. Its products are used in the fields of metallurgy, nuclear power, thermal power, coal chemical, petroleum, petrochemical, desalination, natural gas, and transportation sectors. Jiangsu Shentong Valve Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Qidong, China.
